name: GrimLand (beta)
description:
Come one, come all to Grim land, the admission is free and fun awaits! It contains fun controls and a dark mystery. This is just a beta so that means with your support I can make this game more polished and expand on the terror.  Also, this is a moddable came and I will add the best maps to my game and give it a shoutout. 

controls: w, a, s, d to move and mouse to move. press shift to sprint  or get extra jump power
